title: Need Help Resolution fix
body: When i enter my game my resolution sets to the automatic 1920x1080   but the right side of the screen is cut taking away my mini map of bot lane along with half my mana bar and below   i tried to lower it down to 1768x992 but then nearly half the screen disappears or my clicking and few other function will be completely off of its supposed position..  i tried to go into game config. and change it there but when i do and load up a game it instantly puts me in a window mode of 1024x768....  i have been having this problem a few days now and beginning to miss playing so if anyone could help it would be greatly appreciative!!

replies.body: Just as a heads up, be aware that we don't currently support 4K if this is the case for you.  Your resolution settings may be too high, so it may be necessary to reduce your monitor and in-game resolution, as well as trying to run in fullscreen mode.  Also, make sure that your graphics drivers are up to date so it's rendering the game properly.  Steps for that can be found in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide.  Hope that helps!

thanks for the reply although i have had this monitor  for about 2 years now and played league ... i just recently fixed a problem where i would bugs splat at the post game screen.. my game runs above adv. except for this small problem now

Thanks for the extra info, that's helped a lot!  Bugsplats usually occur from outdated drivers, corrupt game files, or something else entirely.  It's important that we fix this up before anything else!  Go through the steps in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to fix it up.  Hopefully, that was causing the problem and you'll be good to go!
